docs.text: West Log PSR-3 Bridge ¶ A bridge from a West\Log\Log to a Psr\Log\LoggerInterface Usage ¶ A new logger is constructed as follows: namespace West\LogPsr3Bridge ; // a \West\Log\Log $log = ... ; // construct the PSR-3 logger $psrLogger = new Logger ( $log ); That's it! Notes ¶ The PSR-3 specification demands that the log levels given in RFC-5454 be used, so an exception is thrown for invalid log levels.
docs.title: Quick start

docs.text: A bridge from a West\Log\Log to a Psr\Log\LoggerInterface
